pert_zh: COVID-19 显示了与 SARS-CoV 以及 MERS-CoV 具有相似性，因此它们对妊娠的影响可能相似。由于。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 shows similarities to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, so their effects on pregnancy may be similar.

en: Four of seven had first trimester miscarriage, two of five had fetal growth restriction in the second trimester, and four of five had preterm birth.
zh: 4/7 出现妊娠早期流产，2/5 出现妊娠中期胎儿生长受限，4/5 出现早产。
pert_zh: 4/7 出现妊娠早期流产，4/5 出现早产，2/5 出现妊娠中期胎儿生长受限。
bt_pert_zh: 4/7 experienced early pregnancy miscarriage, 4/5 experienced premature birth, and 2/5 experienced mid-pregnancy fetal growth restriction.

en: None of the newborns were infected with SARS-CoV.
zh: 所有新生儿均未感染 SARS-CoV。
pert_zh: 所有新生儿均未感染 SARS-CoV。
bt_pert_zh: None of the newborns were infected with SARS-CoV.

en: A report of ten cases of MERS- CoV infection in pregnancy in Saudi Arabia showed that the clinical presentation is variable, from mild to severe infection.
zh: 来自沙特阿拉伯的一项报告显示，10 名在妊娠期间感染 MERS-CoV 的孕妇临床表现各异，包括轻度和重度感染。
pert_zh: 来自沙特阿拉伯的一项报告显示，在妊娠期间感染 MERS-CoV 的 10 名孕妇临床表现各异，包括轻度和重度感染。
bt_pert_zh: A report from Saudi Arabia showed that 10 pregnant women infected with MERS-CoV during pregnancy had a variety of clinical manifestations, including mild and severe infections.

en: The outcome was favorable in a majority of the cases, but the infant death rate was 27%.A recent review suggested that COVID-19 appeared to be less lethal to mothers and infants than SARS and MERS but that there may be an increased risk of preterm birth after 28 weeks' gestation.
zh: 大多数病例结局良好，但婴儿死亡率为 27%。最近的评论表明，COVID-19 对孕妇和婴儿的致死性似乎低于 SARS 和 MERS，但妊娠 28 周后发生早产的风险可能增加。
pert_zh: 最近的评论表明，大多数病例结局良好，但婴儿死亡率为 27%。COVID-19 对孕妇和婴儿的致死性似乎低于 SARS 和 MERS，但妊娠 28 周后发生早产的风险可能增加。
bt_pert_zh: Recent reviews suggest that outcomes are good in most cases, but infant mortality is 27%. COVID-19 appears to be less lethal to pregnant women and infants than SARS and MERS, but there may be an increased risk of preterm birth after 28 weeks of gestation.

en: The World Health Organization and  Centers for Disease Control and Prevention of the United States advises pregnant women to do the same things as the general public to avoid infection, such as covering cough, avoid interacting with sick people, cleaning hands with soap and water or sanitizer.
zh: 世界卫生组织和美国疾病预防控制中心建议孕妇采取与普通大众相同的措施来避免感染，例如遮挡咳嗽、避免与患者互动、使用肥皂和水或清洁剂洗手。
pert_zh: 世界卫生组织和美国疾病预防控制中心建议孕妇采取与普通大众相同的措施来避免感染，例如使用肥皂和水或清洁剂洗手、遮挡咳嗽、避免与患者互动。
bt_pert_zh: The World Health Organization and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommend that pregnant women take the same steps as the general public to avoid infection, such as washing hands with soap and water or detergent, covering coughs, and avoiding interactions with sick people.

en: A survey conducted in Shanghai among pregnant women in different trimesters of pregnancy identified a strong demand for online access to health information and services.
zh: 上海对不同孕期的孕妇进行的一项调查发现了对在线获取健康信息和服务的强烈需求。
pert_zh: 对在线获取健康信息和服务有强烈需求的一项调查发现了上海对不同孕期的孕妇。
bt_pert_zh: A survey found that there is a strong demand for online access to health information and services among pregnant women at different stages of pregnancy in Shanghai.

en: People expecting their first baby were more willing to have online consultation and guidance than who had previously given birth.The RCOG and RCM recommend that in-person appointments be deferred by 7 days after the start of symptoms of COVID-19 or 14 days if another person in the household has symptoms.
zh: 与以前生过孩子的孕妇相比，头胎孕妇更愿意接受在线咨询和指导。RCOG 和 RCM 建议在出现 COVID-19 症状后将现场预约推迟 7 天，如果家庭中有其他人出现症状，则推迟 14 天。
pert_zh: 头胎孕妇更愿意接受在线咨询和指导，与以前生过孩子的孕妇相比。RCOG 和 RCM 建议在出现 COVID-19 症状后将现场预约推迟 7 天，如果家庭中有其他人出现症状，则推迟 14 天。
bt_pert_zh: First-time pregnant women were more willing to accept online consultation and guidance than those who had given birth previously. The RCOG and RCM recommend deferring in-person appointments for seven days after developing COVID-19 symptoms, or 14 days if someone else in the household has symptoms.

en: Fever subsequently developed in three asymptomatic patients.
zh: 三名无症状患者随后出现发热。
pert_zh: 随后三名无症状患者出现发热。
bt_pert_zh: Three asymptomatic patients subsequently developed fever.

en: One patient who had tested negative subsequently became symptomatic postpartum and tested positive three days after the initial negative test.
zh: 一名检测结果为阴性的患者在产后出现症状，并且在初次检测阴性后三天的检测结果为阳性。
pert_zh: 在产后出现症状的一名检测结果为阴性的患者，并且在初次检测阴性后三天的检测结果为阳性。
bt_pert_zh: One patient who tested negative developed symptoms postpartum and tested positive three days after the initial negative test.

en: The doctors conducting the screening recommended that in order to reduce infection and allocate PPE, due to high numbers of patients presenting as asymptomatic, universal screening of pregnant patients should be conducted.
zh: 进行筛查的医生建议，由于大量患者表现为无症状，为了减少感染和分配 PPE，应该对孕妇进行普查。
pert_zh: 医生建议进行筛查，由于大量患者表现为无症状，为了减少感染和分配PPE，应该对孕妇进行普查。
bt_pert_zh: Doctors recommend screening, as a large number of patients are asymptomatic, and pregnant women should be screened universally in order to reduce infection and allocate PPE.

en: They also suggest that people with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 should have continuous electronic fetal monitoring.
zh: 他们还建议疑似或确诊 COVID-19 的孕妇应进行持续的电子胎儿监护。
pert_zh: 建议他们应持续进行电子胎儿监护的疑似或确诊COVID-19的孕妇。
bt_pert_zh: Pregnant women with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are advised that they should undergo ongoing electronic fetal monitoring.

en: The use of birthing pools is not recommended for suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19 due to the risk of infection via faeces.
zh: 由于存在通过粪便感染的风险，不建议 COVID-19 的疑似或确诊病例使用分娩池。
pert_zh: 不建议 COVID-19 的疑似或确诊病例使用分娩池，由于存在通过粪便感染的风险。
bt_pert_zh: Birthing pools are not recommended for suspected or confirmed cases of COVID-19 due to the risk of infection through feces.

en: In the UK, official recommendations state that precautionary separation of a mother and a healthy baby should not be undertaken lightly and that they should be kept together in the postpartum period where neonatal care is not required.Literature from China recommended separation of infected mothers from babies for 14 days.
zh: 英国官方建议指出，不应轻率地对母亲和健康的婴儿进行预防性隔离，在不需要新生儿护理的情况下，她们应该在产后期待在一起。来自中国的文献建议将受到感染的母亲与婴儿隔离 14 天。
pert_zh: 来自中国的文献建议将受到感染的母亲与婴儿隔离 14 天，英国官方建议指出，不应轻率地对母亲和健康的婴儿进行预防性隔离，在不需要新生儿护理的情况下，她们应该在产后期待在一起。
bt_pert_zh: Literature from China recommends isolating infected mothers from their babies for 14 days, and official UK advice states that preventive isolation of mothers and healthy babies should not be taken lightly and that they should look forward to being together after birth if neonatal care is not required.

en: In the US there is also the recommendation that newborns and mothers should be temporarily separated until transmission-based precautions are discontinued, and that where this is not possible the newborn should be kept 2 metres away from the mother.
zh: 美国也建议，在停止预防传播的措施之前，新生儿和母亲应暂时隔离；如果无法做到，新生儿应与母亲保持 2 米的距
pert_zh: 在停止预防传播的措施之前，美国也建议，新生儿和母亲应暂时隔离；如果无法做到，新生儿应与母亲保持 2 米的距。
bt_pert_zh: The United States also recommends that newborns and mothers should be temporarily isolated before stopping measures to prevent transmission; if this is not possible, newborns should be kept 2 meters away from their mothers.

en: b'COVID-19 surveillance involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to establish the patterns of disease progression.
zh: COVID-19 监测包括监测冠状病毒病的传播，以便确定疾病进展的模式。
pert_zh: 监测 COVID-19 包括监测冠状病毒病的传播，以便确定疾病进展的模式。
bt_pert_zh: Surveillance for COVID-19 involves monitoring the spread of the coronavirus disease in order to identify patterns in disease progression.

en: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends active surveillance, with focus of case finding, testing and contact tracing in all transmission scenarios.
zh: 世界卫生组织 (World Health Organization, WHO) 建议进行主动监测，重点是在所有传播场景下进行病例搜索、检测以及接触者追踪。
pert_zh: 建议进行主动监测，重点是在所有传播场景下进行病例搜索、检测以及接触者追踪，世界卫生组织(World Health Organization, WHO)。
bt_pert_zh: Active surveillance is recommended, focusing on case finding, testing, and contact tracing in all transmission scenarios, the World Health Organization (WHO).

en: COVID-19 surveillance is expected to monitor epidemiological trends, rapidly detect new cases, and based on this information, provide epidemiological information to conduct risk assessment and guide disease preparedness.
zh: 预计 COVID-19 监测将监控流行病学趋势，迅速发现新病例，并基于此信息提供流行病学信息，以进行风险评估和指导疾病预防。
pert_zh: COVID-19 监测将预计监控流行病学趋势，迅速发现新病例，并基于此信息提供流行病学信息，以进行风险评估和指导疾病预防。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 surveillance will be expected to monitor epidemiological trends, detect new cases rapidly, and provide epidemiological information based on this information to conduct risk assessments and guide disease prevention.

en: Syndromic surveillance is done based on the symptoms of an individual that corresponds to COVID-19.
zh: 根据符合 COVID-19 的个体症状进行症状监测。
pert_zh: 根据符合 COVID-19 的个体症状进行症状监测。
bt_pert_zh: Conduct symptom monitoring based on individual symptoms consistent with COVID-19.

en: As of March 2020, the WHO recommends the following case definitions:
zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月，WHO 建议使用以下病例定义：
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月，WHO 建议使用以下病例定义：
bt_pert_zh: As of March 2020, WHO recommends the following case definition:

en: Probable case : "A suspect case for whom testing for the COVID-19 virus is inconclusive" OR "a suspect case for whom testing could not be performed for any reason".
zh: 疑似病例：“COVID-19 病毒检测结果不明确的可疑病例”或“由于任何原因无法进行检测的可疑病例”。
pert_zh: 可疑病例：“COVID-19 病毒检测结果不明确的”或“由于任何原因无法进行检测的可疑病例”。
bt_pert_zh: Suspect case: “Indeterminate COVID-19 virus test result” or “Suspect case where testing is unavailable for any reason”.

en: Confirmed case: "A person with laboratory confirmation of COVID-19 infection, irrespective of clinical signs and symptoms".
zh: 确诊病例：“经实验室检测确认为 COVID-19 感染者，不论是否有临床体征和症状”。
pert_zh: 确诊病例：“不论是否有临床体征和症状，经实验室检测确认为 COVID-19 感染者”。
bt_pert_zh: Confirmed case: “A person who has been confirmed to have COVID-19 infection by laboratory testing, regardless of whether they have clinical signs and symptoms.”

en: Direct physical contact with a probable or confirmed case;
zh: 与疑似或确诊病例有过直接身体接触；
pert_zh: 与疑似或确诊病例有过直接身体接触；
bt_pert_zh: Have had direct physical contact with a suspected or confirmed case;

en: Direct care for a patient with probable or confirmed COVID-19 disease without using proper personal protective equipment;
zh: 在未使用合适个人防护装备的情况下，直接护理疑似或确诊的 COVID-19 疾病病例；
pert_zh: 在未使用合适个人防护装备的情况下，直接护理疑似或确诊的 COVID-19 疾病病例；
bt_pert_zh: Providing direct care for a suspected or confirmed case of COVID-19 illness without using appropriate personal protective equipment;

en: Other situations as indicated by local risk assessments".WHO recommends reporting of probable and confirmed cases of COVID-19 infection within 48 hours of identification.
zh: 当地风险评估提示的其他情形”。WHO 建议在发现后 48 小时内报告疑似和确诊的 COVID-19 感染病例。
pert_zh: “WHO 建议在发现后 48 小时内报告疑似和确诊的 COVID-19 感染病例，当地风险评估提示的其他情形”。
bt_pert_zh: “WHO recommends reporting suspected and confirmed cases of COVID-19 infection within 48 hours of detection, and otherwise as indicated by local risk assessment”.

en: The countries should report on a case-by-case basis as far as possible, but in case of limitation in resources, aggregate weekly reporting is also possible.
zh: 各国应尽可能逐例报告，但在资源有限的情况下，也可以每周汇总报告。
pert_zh: 但在资源有限的情况下，各国应尽可能逐例报告，也可以每周汇总报告。
bt_pert_zh: However, where resources are limited, countries should report on a case-by-case basis whenever possible, or in aggregated weekly reports.

en: Some organizations have created crowdsourced apps for syndromic surveillance, where people can report their symptoms to help researchers map areas with concentration of COVID-19 symptoms.
zh: 一些组织已经创建了用于症状监测的众包手机应用程序，人们可以使用它报告症状，以帮助研究人员绘制 COVID-19 症状集中区域的地图。
pert_zh: 一些组织已经创建了众包手机应用程序用于症状监测，人们可以使用它报告症状，以帮助研究人员绘制 COVID-19 症状集中区域的地图。
bt_pert_zh: Some organizations have created crowdsourced phone apps for symptom monitoring, which people can use to report symptoms to help researchers map areas where COVID-19 symptoms are concentrated.

en: Virological surveillance is done by using molecular tests for COVID-19.
zh: 通过 COVID-19 分子检测完成病毒学监测。
pert_zh: 通过 COVID-19 分子检测完成病毒学监测。
bt_pert_zh: Virological monitoring was completed with COVID-19 molecular testing.

en: WHO has published resources for laboratories on how to perform testing for COVID-19.
zh: WHO 已经为实验室发布了有关如何进行 COVID-19 检测的资源。
pert_zh: 已经为实验室发布了有关如何进行 COVID-19 检测的资源 WHO。
bt_pert_zh: The WHO has published resources for laboratories on how to conduct COVID-19 testing.

en: In the European Union, laboratory confirmed cases of COVID-19 are reported within 24 hours of identification.
zh: 欧盟要求在发现后 24 小时内报告经实验室检测确诊的 COVID-19 病例。
pert_zh: 在发现后 24 小时内，欧盟要求报告经实验室检测确诊的 COVID-19 病例。
bt_pert_zh: The EU requires reporting of COVID-19 cases confirmed by laboratory testing within 24 hours of detection.

en: At least 24 countries have established digital surveillance of their citizens.
zh: 至少有 24 个国家对其公民开展了数字化监测。
pert_zh: 至少有 24 个国家对其公民开展了数字化监测。
bt_pert_zh: At least 24 countries conduct digital surveillance of their citizens.

en: The digital surveillance technologies include apps, location data and electronic tags.
zh: 数字化监测技术包括手机应用程序、位置数据和电子标签。
pert_zh: 手机应用程序、位置数据和电子标签包括数字化监测技术。
bt_pert_zh: Mobile phone apps, location data and electronic tags comprise digital monitoring technologies.

en: The Center For Disease Control and Prevention in USA tracks the travel information of individuals using airline passenger data.
zh: 美国疾病预防控制中心使用航空旅客数据跟踪个人旅行信息。
pert_zh: 美国疾病预防控制中心使用航空旅客数据跟踪个人旅行信息。
bt_pert_zh: The CDC uses airline passenger data to track individual travel information.

en: In Hong Kong, authorities are requiring a bracelet and an app for all travellers.
zh: 香港的有关部门要求所有游客都佩戴手环并安装相应手机应用程序。
pert_zh: 有关部门要求所有游客都佩戴手环并安装相应手机应用程序，香港。
bt_pert_zh: Relevant departments require all tourists to wear wristbands and install corresponding mobile applications, Hong Kong.

en: A GPS app is used to track the locations of individuals in South Korea to ensure against quarantine breach, sending alerts to the user and to authorities if people leave designated areas.
zh: 韩国使用 GPS 应用程序跟踪个人位置以确保不违反隔离规定，如果有人离开指定区域，程序会向该用户和有关部门发送警报。
pert_zh: 如果有人离开指定区域，韩国使用 GPS 应用程序跟踪个人位置以确保不违反隔离规定，程序会向该用户和有关部门发送警报。
bt_pert_zh: South Korea uses GPS apps to track individual locations to ensure quarantine rules are not violated if someone leaves a designated area, sending alerts to the user and relevant authorities.

en: In Singapore, individuals have to report their locations with photographic proof.
zh: 新加坡的人员必须使用照片证据报告其位置。
pert_zh: 人员必须使用照片证据报告其位置的新加坡。
bt_pert_zh: Personnel are required to report their location to Singapore using photographic evidence.

en: Thailand is using an app and SIM cards for all travelers to enforce their quarantine.
zh: 泰国利用手机应用程序和 SIM 卡对所有游客实施隔离。
pert_zh: 泰国利用 SIM 卡和手机应用程序对所有游客实施隔离。
bt_pert_zh: Thailand uses SIM cards and phone apps to quarantine all visitors.

en: Human rights organizations have criticized some of these measures, asking the governments not to use the pandemic as a cover to introduce invasive digital surveillance.
zh: 人权组织已经批评了其中一些措施，反对政府以疫情为借口引入侵入性数字化监测手段。
pert_zh: 反对政府以疫情为借口引入侵入性数字化监测手段的其中一些措施已经被人权组织批评了。
bt_pert_zh: Some of the measures to oppose the government's use of the pandemic as an excuse to introduce invasive digital surveillance methods have been criticized by human rights organizations.

en: b'Coronaviruses are a group of related viruses that cause diseases in mammals and birds.
zh: 冠状病毒是引起哺乳动物和鸟类疾病的一组相关病毒。
pert_zh: 引起哺乳动物和鸟类疾病的一组相关病毒是冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: A group of related viruses that cause disease in mammals and birds are called coronaviruses.

en: In humans, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract infections that can range from mild to lethal.
zh: 在人类中，这些病毒会引起呼吸道感染，程度从轻微到致命不等。
pert_zh: 在人类中，这些病毒会引起呼吸道感染，程度从轻微到致命不等。
bt_pert_zh: In humans, these viruses cause respiratory infections that can range from mild to fatal.

en: Mild illnesses include some cases of the common cold (which has other possible causes, predominantly rhinoviruses), while more lethal varieties can cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19.
zh: 轻微疾病包括一些普通的感冒（也可能由某些其他病毒引起，主要是鼻病毒），更具致死性的病毒变种可导致 SARS、MERS 和 COVID-19。
pert_zh: 更具致死性的病毒变种可导致 SARS、MERS 和 COVID-19，轻微疾病包括一些普通的感冒（也可能由某些其他病毒引起，主要是鼻病毒）。
bt_pert_zh: More lethal variants of the virus cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19, and milder illnesses include some common colds (which can also be caused by certain other viruses, primarily rhinoviruses).

en: Symptoms in other species vary: in chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract disease, while in cows and pigs they cause diarrhea.
zh: 其他物种的症状各不相同：在鸡中，会引起上呼吸道疾病，而在牛和猪中，则会导致腹泻。
pert_zh: 在鸡中，症状各不相同：会引起上呼吸道疾病，而在牛和猪中，则会导致腹泻，其他物种的。
bt_pert_zh: In chickens, symptoms vary: it causes upper respiratory tract disease, while in cattle and pigs it causes diarrhea, and in other species it causes diarrhea.

en: There are yet to be vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infections.
zh: 目前尚无预防或治疗人冠状病毒感染的疫苗或抗病毒药物。
pert_zh: 目前尚无预防或治疗人冠状病毒感染的疫苗或抗病毒药物。
bt_pert_zh: There are currently no vaccines or antiviral drugs to prevent or treat human coronavirus infection.

en: Coronaviruses constitute the subfamily Orthocoronavirinae, in the family Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
zh: 冠状病毒属于核糖病毒域、套式病毒目、冠状病毒科的正冠状病毒亚科。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒亚科是核糖病毒域、套式病毒目、冠状病毒科的正冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: The Coronavirinae are orthocoronaviruses of the Riboviridae domain, Nidovirales order, Coronaviridae family.

en: They are enveloped viruses with a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome and a nucleocapsid of helical symmetry.
zh: 它们是具有阳性单链 RNA 基因组和螺旋对称核衣壳的包膜病毒。
pert_zh: 包膜病毒是具有阳性单链 RNA 基因组和螺旋对称核衣壳的。
bt_pert_zh: Enveloped viruses are those with a positive-sense single-stranded RNA genome and a helical symmetric nucleocapsid.

en: The genome size of coronaviruses ranges from approximately 26 to 32 kilobases, one of the largest among RNA viruses.
zh: 冠状病毒的基因组大小约在 2.6 到 3.2 万个碱基之间，是 RNA 病毒中最大的。
pert_zh: 基因组大小约在 2.6 到 3.2 万个碱基之间，是 RNA 病毒中最大的冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: The genome size is approximately between 26,000 and 32,000 bases, making it the largest coronavirus among RNA viruses.

en: They have characteristic club-shaped spikes that project from their surface, which in electron micrographs create an image reminiscent of the solar corona from which their name derives.
zh: 它们的表面有独特的棒状突起，在电子显微照片中，这种突起形成的图像使人联想到日冕，并由此得名。
pert_zh: 在电子显微照片中，它们的表面有独特的棒状突起，这种突起形成的图像使人联想到日冕，并由此得名。
bt_pert_zh: In electron micrographs, their surfaces have distinctive rod-like protrusions that form an image reminiscent of the solar corona, hence the name.

en: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when an acute respiratory infection of domesticated chickens was shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (IBV).
zh: 冠状病毒于 20 世纪 30 年代首次被发现，当时证明家禽的急性呼吸道感染是由传染性支气管炎病毒 (IBV) 引起的。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒于 20 世纪 30 年代首次被发现，当时证明家禽的急性呼吸道感染是由传染性支气管炎病毒 (IBV) 引起的。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses were first discovered in the 1930s when acute respiratory infections in poultry were shown to be caused by infectious bronchitis virus (IBV).

en: In the 1940s, two more animal coronaviruses, mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) and transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV), were isolated.Human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.
zh: 20 世纪 40 年代，另外两种动物冠状病毒，鼠肝炎病毒 (MHV) 和猪传染性胃肠炎病毒 (TGEV) 被分离出来。人冠状病毒在 20 世纪 60 年代被发现。
pert_zh: 另外两种动物冠状病毒，鼠肝炎病毒 (MHV) 和猪传染性胃肠炎病毒 (TGEV)，在20世纪40年代被分离出来。人冠状病毒在20世纪60年代被发现。
bt_pert_zh: Two other animal coronaviruses, murine hepatitis virus (MHV) and porcine transmissible gastroenteritis virus (TGEV), were isolated in the 1940s. Human coronaviruses were discovered in the 1960s.

en: The earliest ones studied were from human patients with the common cold, which were later named human coronavirus 229E and human coronavirus OC43.
zh: 最早的研究对象是来自普通感冒患者的病毒，这些病毒后来被命名为人冠状病毒 229E 和人冠状病毒 OC43。
pert_zh: 来自普通感冒患者的病毒是最早的研究对象，这些病毒后来被命名为人冠状病毒 229E 和人冠状病毒 OC43。
bt_pert_zh: Viruses from people with the common cold were the first to be studied, and these viruses were later named human coronavirus 229E and human coronavirus OC43.

en: They were first imaged by Scottish virologist June Almeida at St. Thomas Hospital in London.
zh: 伦敦圣托马斯医院的苏格兰病毒学家 June Almeida 首次对其进行成像。
pert_zh: June Almeida，伦敦圣托马斯医院的苏格兰病毒学家，首次对其进行成像。
bt_pert_zh: June Almeida, a Scottish virologist at St Thomas' Hospital in London, imaged it for the first time.

en: Other human coronaviruses have since been identified, including SARS-CoV in 2003, HCoV NL63 in 2004, HKU1 in 2005, MERS-CoV in 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 in 2019.
zh: 此后，其他人冠状病毒也相继被确认，包括 2003 年的 SARS-CoV、2004 年的 HCoV NL63、2005 年的 HKU1、2012 年的 MERS-CoV 和 2019 年的 SARS-CoV-2。
pert_zh: 其他人冠状病毒也相继被确认，包括 2003 年的 SARS-CoV、2004 年的 HCoV NL63、2005 年的 HKU1、2012 年的 MERS-CoV 和 2019 年的 SARS-CoV-2，此后。
bt_pert_zh: Other human coronaviruses have been identified, including SARS-CoV in 2003, HCoV NL63 in 2004, HKU1 in 2005, MERS-CoV in 2012, and SARS-CoV-2 in 2019, since then.

en: Most of these have involved serious respiratory tract infections.
zh: 其中大多数涉及严重的呼吸道感染。
pert_zh: 大多数其中涉及严重的呼吸道感染。
bt_pert_zh: Most of these involved severe respiratory infections.

en: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal Nature to designate the new family of viruses.
zh: 1968 年，一个非正式的病毒学家小组在《自然》杂志上首次使用该名称来命名新的病毒家族。
pert_zh: 一个非正式的病毒学家小组在《自然》杂志上首次使用该名称来命名新的病毒家族于 1968 年。
bt_pert_zh: The name was first used in 1968 by an informal group of virologists in the journal Nature to designate a new family of viruses.

en: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infective form of the virus) by electron microscopy, which have a fringe of large, bulbous surface projections creating an image reminiscent of a crown or of a solar corona.
zh: 该名称指的是通过电子显微镜观察到的病毒粒子（病毒的传染形式）的特征外观，病毒粒子的边缘带有较大的球状表面突起，其产生的图像让人联想起皇冠或日冕。
pert_zh: 该名称指的是通过电子显微镜观察到的病毒粒子（病毒的传染形式）的特征外观，病毒粒子的边缘带有较大的球状表面突起，让人联想起皇冠或日冕的图像产生。
bt_pert_zh: The name refers to the characteristic appearance of virions (the infectious form of the virus) observed through an electron microscope, with large spherical surface protrusions on the edges of the virions, reminiscent of a crown or corona.

en: This morphology is created by the viral spike peplomers, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.
zh: 这种形态是由病毒刺突形成的，它们是病毒表面的蛋白质。
pert_zh: 这种形态由病毒刺突形成的，它们是病毒表面的蛋白质。
bt_pert_zh: This shape is formed by viral spikes, which are proteins on the surface of the virus.

en: Coronaviruses are large pleomorphic spherical particles with bulbous surface projections.
zh: 冠状病毒是具有球状表面突起的大型多形性球形颗粒。
pert_zh: 具有球状表面突起的大型多形性球形颗粒是冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Large, pleomorphic, spherical particles with spherical surface protrusions are coronaviruses.

en: The envelope of the virus in electron micrographs appears as a distinct pair of electron dense shells.The viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer where the membrane (M), envelope (E) and spike (S) structural proteins are anchored.
zh: 电子显微照片中病毒的包膜显示为一对独特的电子致密壳。病毒包膜由脂质双层组成，膜 (M)、包膜 (E) 和棘突 (S) 结构蛋白锚定在其中。
pert_zh: 病毒包膜由脂质双层组成，膜 (M)、包膜 (E) 和棘突 (S) 结构蛋白锚定在其中，显示为一对独特的电子致密壳在电子显微照片中。
bt_pert_zh: The viral envelope consists of a lipid bilayer in which the membrane (M), envelope (E), and spike (S) structural proteins are anchored, appearing as a pair of distinctive electron-dense shells in electron micrographs.

en: The lipid bilayer envelope, membrane proteins, and nucleocapsid protect the virus when it is outside the host cell.
zh: 当病毒位于宿主细胞之外时，脂质双层膜、膜蛋白和核衣壳可以保护病毒。
pert_zh: 当病毒位于宿主细胞之外时，核衣壳、脂质双层膜和膜蛋白可以保护病毒。
bt_pert_zh: When the virus is outside the host cell, the nucleocapsid, lipid bilayer membrane and membrane proteins can protect the virus.

en: Coronaviruses contain a positive-sense, single-stranded RNA genome.
zh: 冠状病毒包含正义的单链 RNA 基因组。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒包含单链 RNA 的正义基因组。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses contain positive-sense genomes of single-stranded RNA.

en: The genome size for coronaviruses ranges from 26.4 to 31.7 kilobases.
zh: 冠状病毒的基因组大小约为 2.64 至 3.17 万个碱基。
pert_zh: 基因组大小约为 2.64 至 3.17 万个碱基的冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses with genome sizes of approximately 26,400 to 31,700 bases.

en: The genome size is one of the largest among RNA viruses.
zh: 其基因组大小是 RNA 病毒中最大的。
pert_zh: 其基因组大小是 RNA 病毒中最大的。
bt_pert_zh: Its genome size is the largest among RNA viruses.

en: The open reading frames 1a and 1b, which occupy the first two-thirds of the genome, encode the replicase/transcriptase polyprotein.
zh: 占据基因组前三分之二的开放阅读框 1a 和 1b 编码复制酶/转录酶多蛋白。
pert_zh: 开放阅读框1a和1b编码复制酶/转录酶多蛋白，占据基因组前三分之二。
bt_pert_zh: Open reading frames 1a and 1b encode the replicase/transcriptase polyproteins and occupy the first two thirds of the genome.

en: The replicase/transcriptase polyprotein self cleaves to form nonstructural proteins.The later reading frames encode the four major structural proteins: spike, envelope, membrane, and nucleocapsid.
zh: 复制酶/转录酶多蛋白自身裂解形成非结构蛋白。后面的阅读框编码四种主要的结构蛋白：棘突、包膜、膜和核衣壳。
pert_zh: 复制酶/转录酶多蛋白自身裂解形成非结构蛋白，后面的阅读框编码四种主要的结构蛋白：核衣壳、棘突、包膜和膜。
bt_pert_zh: The replicase/transcriptase polyprotein cleaves itself to form nonstructural proteins, and the following reading frame encodes the four major structural proteins: nucleocapsid, spike, envelope, and membrane.

en: Interspersed between these reading frames are the reading frames for the accessory proteins.
zh: 在这些阅读框之间散布着辅助蛋白的阅读框。
pert_zh: 散布着辅助蛋白的阅读框在这些阅读框之间。
bt_pert_zh: Interspersed between these reading frames are reading frames for accessory proteins.

en: The number of accessory proteins and their function is unique depending on the specific coronavirus.
zh: 辅助蛋白的数量及其功能取决于特定的冠状病毒。
pert_zh: 辅助蛋白的数量及其功能取决于特定的冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: The number of accessory proteins and their functions depend on the specific coronavirus.

en: Infection begins when the viral spike (S) glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor.
zh: 病毒棘突 (S) 糖蛋白附着在其互补宿主细胞受体后开始感染。
pert_zh: (S) 糖蛋白附着在其互补宿主细胞受体后开始感染病毒棘突。
bt_pert_zh: (S) Infection begins after the glycoprotein attaches to its complementary host cell receptor on the viral spike.

en: After attachment, a protease of the host cell cleaves and activates the receptor-attached spike protein.
zh: 附着后，宿主细胞的蛋白酶裂解并激活受体附着的棘突蛋白。
pert_zh: 宿主细胞的蛋白酶在附着后裂解并激活受体附着的棘突蛋白。
bt_pert_zh: Host cell proteases cleave and activate the receptor-attached spike protein upon attachment.

en: Depending on the host cell protease available, cleavage and activation allows the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelop with the host membrane.On entry into the host cell, the virus particle is uncoated, and its genome enters the cell cytoplasm.
zh: 根据可用的宿主细胞蛋白酶，裂解和激活允许病毒通过内吞作用或病毒包膜与宿主膜的直接融合进入宿主细胞。进入宿主细胞后，病毒颗粒没有被包裹，其基因组进入细胞质。
pert_zh: 根据可用的宿主细胞蛋白酶，裂解和激活允许病毒通过内吞作用或病毒包膜与宿主膜的直接融合进入宿主细胞。病毒颗粒进入宿主细胞后，没有被包裹，其基因组进入细胞质。
bt_pert_zh: Depending on the available host cell proteases, cleavage and activation allow the virus to enter the host cell by endocytosis or direct fusion of the viral envelope with the host membrane. After the viral particle enters the host cell, it is not encapsidated and its genome enters the cytoplasm.

en: The host ribosome translates the initial overlapping open reading frame of the virus genome and forms a long polyprotein.
zh: 宿主核糖体翻译病毒基因组最初重叠的开放阅读框并形成长的多聚蛋白。
pert_zh: 宿主核糖体翻译病毒基因组最初重叠的开放阅读框并形成多长的聚蛋白。
bt_pert_zh: Host ribosomes translate the initially overlapping open reading frames of the viral genome and form multi-length polyproteins.

en: The polyprotein has its own proteases which cleave the polyprotein into multiple nonstructural proteins.
zh: 这种多聚蛋白有自己的蛋白酶，它可以将多聚蛋白裂解成多个非结构蛋白。
pert_zh: 这种多聚蛋白有自己的蛋白酶，它可以将多聚蛋白裂解成多个非结构蛋白。
bt_pert_zh: This polyprotein has its own protease, which can cleave the polyprotein into multiple non-structural proteins.

en: A number of the nonstructural proteins coalesce to form a multi-protein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC).
zh: 许多非结构蛋白结合形成多蛋白复制酶-转录酶复合体 (RTC)。
pert_zh: 多蛋白复制酶-转录酶复合体 (RTC)结合形成许多非结构蛋白。
bt_pert_zh: The multiprotein replicase-transcriptase complex (RTC) combines to form many nonstructural proteins.

en: The main replicase-transcriptase protein is the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp).
zh: 主要的复制酶-转录酶蛋白是 RNA 依赖性 RNA 聚合酶 (RdRp)。
pert_zh: RNA 依赖性 RNA 聚合酶 (RdRp) 是主要的复制酶-转录酶蛋白。
bt_pert_zh: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp) is the major replicase-transcriptase protein.

en: It is directly involved in the replication and transcription of RNA from an RNA strand.
zh: 它直接参与 RNA 链中 RNA 的复制和转录。
pert_zh: 它直接参与 RNA 的复制和转录中 RNA 链。
bt_pert_zh: It is directly involved in RNA replication and transcription of RNA chains.

en: The other nonstructural proteins in the complex assist in the replication and transcription process.
zh: 复合体中的其他非结构蛋白协助完成复制和转录过程。
pert_zh: 其他非结构蛋白在复合体中协助完成复制和转录过程。
bt_pert_zh: Other nonstructural proteins assist in the replication and transcription processes within the complex.

en: The exoribonuclease nonstructural protein, for instance, provides extra fidelity to replication by providing a proofreading function which the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase lacks.One of the main functions of the complex is to replicate the viral genome.
zh: 例如，核糖核酸外切酶非结构蛋白通过提供 RNA 依赖性 RNA 聚合酶所缺乏的校对功能，为复制提供了额外的保真度。该复合体的主要功能之一是复制病毒基因组。
pert_zh: 为复制提供了额外的保真度，例如，核糖核酸外切酶非结构蛋白通过提供 RNA 依赖性 RNA 聚合酶所缺乏的校对功能。该复合体的主要功能之一是复制病毒基因组。
bt_pert_zh: Provides additional fidelity to replication, for example, the exoribonuclease nonstructural protein by providing a proofreading function that RNA-dependent RNA polymerase lacks. One of the main functions of this complex is to replicate the viral genome.

en: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense genomic RNA from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
zh: RdRp 直接介导正义基因组 RNA 合成反义基因组 RNA。
pert_zh: 直接介导 RdRp 正义基因组 RNA 合成反义基因组 RNA。
bt_pert_zh: Directly mediates the synthesis of antisense genomic RNA from RdRp sense genomic RNA.

en: This is followed by the replication of positive-sense genomic RNA from the negative-sense genomic RNA.
zh: 接下来是从反义基因组 RNA 复制正义基因组 RNA。
pert_zh: 从反义基因组 RNA 复制正义基因组 RNA 是接下来的。
bt_pert_zh: Replication of the sense genomic RNA from the antisense genomic RNA comes next.

en: The other important function of the complex is to transcribe the viral genome.
zh: 该复合体的另一个重要功能是转录病毒基因组。
pert_zh: 该复合体的另一个重要功能是转录病毒基因组。
bt_pert_zh: Another important function of this complex is to transcribe the viral genome.

en: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules from the positive-sense genomic RNA.
zh: RdRp 直接介导正义基因组 RNA 合成反义亚基因组 RNA 分子。
pert_zh: RdRp 直接介导反义亚基因组 RNA 分子的正义基因组 RNA 合成。
bt_pert_zh: RdRp directly mediates the synthesis of positive-sense genomic RNA from antisense subgenomic RNA molecules.

en: This is followed by the transcription of these negative-sense subgenomic RNA molecules to their corresponding positive-sense mRNAs.
zh: 随后，这些反义亚基因组 RNA 分子转录为其相应的正义 mRNA。
pert_zh: 这些反义亚基因组 RNA 分子随后转录为其相应的正义 mRNA。
bt_pert_zh: These antisense subgenomic RNA molecules are subsequently transcribed into their corresponding sense mRNAs.

en: The replicated positive-sense genomic RNA becomes the genome of the progeny viruses.
zh: 复制的正义基因组 RNA 成为子代病毒的基因组。
pert_zh: 复制的基因组 RNA 成为子代病毒的正义基因组。
bt_pert_zh: The replicated genomic RNA becomes the positive-sense genome of the progeny viruses.

en: The mRNAs are gene transcripts of the last third of the virus genome after the initial overlapping reading frame.
zh: mRNA 是最初重叠阅读框后病毒基因组最后三分之一的基因转录本。
pert_zh: mRNA 是最初重叠阅读框后病毒基因组最后三分之一的基因转录本。
bt_pert_zh: mRNA is the gene transcript of the last third of the viral genome after the initial overlapping reading frame.

en: These mRNAs are translated by the host's ribosomes into the structural proteins and a number of accessory proteins.
zh: 这些 mRNA 被宿主的核糖体翻译成结构蛋白和若干辅助蛋白。
pert_zh: 这些 mRNA 被宿主的核糖体翻译成若干辅助蛋白和结构蛋白。
bt_pert_zh: These mRNAs are translated by the host's ribosomes into several accessory and structural proteins.

en: RNA translation occurs inside the endoplasmic reticulum.
zh: RNA 翻译发生在内质网内。
pert_zh: RNA 翻译在内质网内发生。
bt_pert_zh: RNA translation occurs within the endoplasmic reticulum.

en: The viral structural proteins S, E, and M move along the secretory pathway into the Golgi intermediate compartment.
zh: 病毒结构蛋白 S、E 和 M 沿着分泌途径进入高尔基体中间室。
pert_zh: 在高尔基体中间室，病毒结构蛋白 S、E 和 M 沿着分泌途径进入。
bt_pert_zh: In the intermediate Golgi compartment, the viral structural proteins S, E, and M enter along the secretory pathway.

en: There, the M proteins direct most protein-protein interactions required for assembly of viruses following its binding to the nucleocapsid.
zh: 在那里，M 蛋白在与核衣壳结合后，指导病毒组装所需的绝大多数蛋白-蛋白相互作用。
pert_zh: 在与核衣壳结合后，M 蛋白在那里指导病毒组装所需的绝大多数蛋白-蛋白相互作用。
bt_pert_zh: After binding to the nucleocapsid, the M protein directs the vast majority of protein-protein interactions required for viral assembly.

en: Progeny viruses are then released from the host cell by exocytosis through secretory vesicles.
zh: 之后，子代病毒通过分泌小泡的胞吐作用从宿主细胞中释放出来。
pert_zh: 子代病毒之后通过分泌小泡的胞吐作用从宿主细胞中释放出来。
bt_pert_zh: Progeny viruses are then released from the host cell by exocytosis of secretory vesicles.

en: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is central in determining the tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range of the virus.
zh: 冠状病毒棘突蛋白与其补体宿主细胞受体的相互作用在确定病毒的组织嗜性、感染性和物种范围方面至关重要。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒棘突蛋白在确定病毒的组织嗜性、感染性和物种范围方面与其补体宿主细胞受体的相互作用至关重要。
bt_pert_zh: The interaction of the coronavirus spike protein with its complement host cell receptor is critical in determining the virus's tissue tropism, infectivity, and species range.

en: The SARS coronavirus, for example, infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptor.
zh: 例如，SARS 冠状病毒通过附在血管紧张素转换酶2 (ACE2) 受体上而感染人类细胞。
pert_zh: SARS 冠状病毒通过附在血管紧张素转换酶2 (ACE2) 受体上而感染人类细胞，例如。
bt_pert_zh: SARS coronavirus infects human cells by attaching to the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptor, for example.

en: The scientific name for coronavirus is Orthocoronavirinae or Coronavirinae.
zh: 冠状病毒的学名是 Orthocoronavirinae 或 Coronavirinae。
pert_zh: 学名是 Orthocoronavirinae 或 Coronavirinae 的冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: The scientific name is Coronavirus, Orthocoronavirinae or Coronavirinae.

en: Coronaviruses belong to the family of Coronaviridae, order Nidovirales, and realm Riboviria.
zh: 冠状病毒属于核糖病毒域、套式病毒目、冠状病毒科。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒科属于核糖病毒域、套式病毒目。
bt_pert_zh: The Coronaviridae family belongs to the Riboviridae domain, Nidovirales order.

en: Genus Betacoronavirus; type species: Murine coronavirus
zh: β-冠状病毒；模式种：鼠冠状病毒
pert_zh: 模式种：鼠冠状病毒；β-冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Type species: mouse coronavirus; beta-coronavirus.

en: Species: Betacoronavirus 1 (Bovine Coronavirus, Human coronavirus OC43), Human coronavirus HKU1, Murine coronavirus, Pipistrellus bat coronavirus HKU5, Rousettus bat coronavirus HKU9, Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2), Tylonycteris bat coronavirus HKU4, Middle East respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, Hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV)
zh: 异种：β-冠状病毒 1（牛冠状病毒，人冠状病毒 OC43）、人冠状病毒 HKU1、鼠冠状病毒、伏蝙蝠冠状病毒 HKU5、棕果蝠冠状病毒 HKU9、严重急性呼吸道综合征相关冠状病毒 (SARS-CoV、SARS-CoV-2)、扁颅蝠冠状病毒 HKU4、中东呼吸综合征相关冠状病毒、刺猬冠状病毒 1 (EriCoV)
pert_zh: 异种：人冠状病毒 HKU1、鼠冠状病毒、伏蝙蝠冠状病毒 HKU5、棕果蝠冠状病毒 HKU9、刺猬冠状病毒 1 (EriCoV)、β-冠状病毒 1（牛冠状病毒、人冠状病毒 OC43）、扁颅蝠冠状病毒 HKU4、中东呼吸综合征相关冠状病毒、严重急性呼吸道综合征相关冠状病毒 (SARS-CoV、SARS-CoV-2)
bt_pert_zh: Heterotypes: Human coronavirus HKU1, mouse coronavirus, ramid bat coronavirus HKU5, brown fruit bat coronavirus HKU9, hedgehog coronavirus 1 (EriCoV), beta-coronavirus 1 (bovine coronavirus, human coronavirus OC43), flat-headed bat coronavirus HKU4, Middle East respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2)

en: Species: Beluga whale coronavirus SW1, Infectious bronchitis virus
zh: 异种：白鲸冠状病毒 SW1、传染性支气管炎病毒
pert_zh: 异种：传染性支气管炎病毒、白鲸冠状病毒 SW1
bt_pert_zh: Alien: Infectious bronchitis virus, Beluga coronavirus SW1

en: The most recent common ancestor (MRCA) of all coronaviruses is estimated to have existed as recently as 8000 BCE, although some models place the common ancestor as far back as 55 million years or more, implying long term coevolution with bat and avian species.
zh: 据估计，所有冠状病毒的最近共同祖先 (MRCA) 早在公元前 8000 年就已经存在，但也有一些模型将共同祖先追溯到 5500 万年前或更早，这意味着病毒与蝙蝠和鸟类经过了长期共同进化。
pert_zh: 据估计，病毒与蝙蝠和鸟类经过了长期共同进化，所有冠状病毒的最近共同祖先 (MRCA) 早在公元前 8000 年就已经存在，但也有一些模型将共同祖先追溯到 5500 万年前或更早。
bt_pert_zh: It is estimated that the virus has co-evolved with bats and birds for a long time, with the most recent common ancestor (MRCA) of all coronaviruses existing as early as 8000 BC, but some models date the common ancestor back to 55 million years ago or earlier.

en: The most recent common ancestor of the alphacoronavirus line has been placed at about 2400 BCE, the betacoronavirus line at 3300 BCE, the gammacoronavirus line at 2800 BCE, and the deltacoronavirus line at about 3000 BCE.
zh: α 冠状病毒系的最近共同祖先位于约公元前 2400年，β 冠状病毒系位于公元前 3300 年，γ 冠状病毒系位于公元前 2800 年，δ 冠状病毒系位于公元前 3000 年左右。
pert_zh: 最近共同祖先位于约公元前 2400 年的 α 冠状病毒系，公元前 3300 年的 β 冠状病毒系，公元前 2800 年的 γ 冠状病毒系，公元前 3000 年左右的 δ 冠状病毒系。
bt_pert_zh: The most recent common ancestor was located at about 2400 BC for the alpha coronavirus lineage, 3300 BC for the beta coronavirus lineage, 2800 BC for the gamma coronavirus lineage, and around 3000 BC for the delta coronavirus lineage.

en: The large number of host bat and avian species, and their global range, has enabled extensive evolution and dissemination of coronaviruses.Many human coronavirus have their origin in bats.
zh: 大量的蝙蝠和鸟类寄主物种及其全球范围，使冠状病毒得以广泛进化和传播。许多人冠状病毒起源于蝙蝠。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒得以广泛进化和传播是因为大量的蝙蝠和鸟类寄主物种及其全球范围，许多人冠状病毒起源于蝙蝠。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses are able to evolve and spread widely because of their large number of bat and bird host species and their global range, with many human coronaviruses originating in bats.

en: More recently, alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229E diverged sometime before 1960.
zh: 最近的一次进化发生在 1960 年前的某个时候，羊驼冠状病毒和人冠状病毒 229E 出现了分化。
pert_zh: 进化最近的一次发生在 1960 年前的某个时候，羊驼冠状病毒和人冠状病毒 229E 出现了分化。
bt_pert_zh: The most recent evolutionary divergence occurred sometime before 1960, when the alpaca coronavirus and human coronavirus 229E diverged.

en: MERS-CoV emerged in humans from bats through the intermediate host of camels.
zh: 起源于蝙蝠的 MERS-CoV 通过中间的骆驼宿主在人类中出现。
pert_zh: 通过中间的骆驼宿主在人类中出现的 MERS-CoV 起源于蝙蝠。
bt_pert_zh: The MERS-CoV that emerged in humans via an intermediate camel host originated from bats.

en: MERS-CoV, although related to several bat coronavirus species, appears to have diverged from these several centuries ago.
zh: MERS-CoV 虽然与几种蝙蝠冠状病毒有亲缘关系，但似乎在几个世纪前就已经从这些冠状病毒中分化出来了。
pert_zh: 虽然 MERS-CoV 与几种蝙蝠冠状病毒有亲缘关系，但似乎在几个世纪前就已经从这些冠状病毒中分化出来了。
bt_pert_zh: Although MERS-CoV is related to several bat coronaviruses, it appears to have diverged from these coronaviruses centuries ago.

en: The most closely related bat coronavirus and SARS-CoV diverged in 1986.
zh: 关系最密切的蝙蝠冠状病毒和 SARS-CoV 在 1986 年发生了分化。
pert_zh: 在 1986 年发生了分化，关系最密切的蝙蝠冠状病毒和 SARS-CoV。
bt_pert_zh: The most closely related bat coronaviruses and SARS-CoV diverged in 1986.

en: A possible path of evolution, of SARS coronavirus and keen bat coronaviruses, suggests that SARS related coronaviruses coevolved in bats for a long time.
zh: SARS 冠状病毒和蝙蝠冠状病毒可能的进化路径表明，SARS 相关的冠状病毒在蝙蝠体内共同进化了很长一段时间。
pert_zh: SARS 相关的冠状病毒在蝙蝠体内共同进化了很长一段时间，可能的进化路径表明，SARS 冠状病毒和蝙蝠冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: SARS-related coronaviruses have co-evolved in bats for a long time, and possible evolutionary paths suggest that SARS coronavirus and bat coronavirus.

en: In the 1790s, equine coronavirus diverged from the bovine coronavirus after a cross-species jump.
zh: 18 世纪 90 年代，马冠状病毒在跨物种跳跃后从牛冠状病毒中分离出来。
pert_zh: 在跨物种跳跃后，18 世纪 90 年代，马冠状病毒从牛冠状病毒中分离出来。
bt_pert_zh: After jumping across species, the equine coronavirus was separated from the bovine coronavirus in the 1790s.

en: Later in the 1890s, human coronavirus OC43 diverged from bovine coronavirus after another cross-species spillover event.
zh: 19 世纪 90 年代后期，人冠状病毒 OC43 在另一次跨物种溢出事件后从牛冠状病毒中分离出来。
pert_zh: 人冠状病毒 OC43 在另一次跨物种溢出事件后，19 世纪 90 年代后期从牛冠状病毒中分离出来。
bt_pert_zh: Human coronavirus OC43 was isolated from a bovine coronavirus in the late 1890s after another cross-species spillover event.

en: It is speculated that the flu pandemic of 1890 may have been caused by this spillover event, and not by the influenza virus, because of the related timing, neurological symptoms, and unknown causative agent of the pandemic.
zh: 据推测，鉴于大流行的相关时间、神经学症状和未知的病原体，1890 年的流感大流行可能是由这一溢出事件而不是由流感病毒引起的。
pert_zh: 据推测，1890 年的流感大流行可能是由这一溢出事件而不是由流感病毒引起的，鉴于大流行的相关时间、神经学症状和未知的病原体。
bt_pert_zh: It has been speculated that the 1890 influenza pandemic may have been caused by this spillover event rather than by influenza virus, given the relative timing of the pandemic, the neurological symptoms, and the unknown pathogen.

en: Human coronavirus OC43 besides causing respiratory infections is also suspected of playing a role in neurological diseases.
zh: 人冠状病毒 OC43 除引起呼吸道感染外，还被怀疑与神经系统疾病有关。
pert_zh: 人冠状病毒 OC43 被怀疑与神经系统疾病有关，除引起呼吸道感染外。
bt_pert_zh: Human coronavirus OC43 is suspected to be associated with neurological diseases, in addition to causing respiratory infections.

en: In the 1950s, the human coronavirus OC43 began to diverge into its present genotypes.
zh: 20 世纪 50 年代，人冠状病毒 OC43 开始分化为目前的基因型。
pert_zh: 在 20 世纪 50 年代，人冠状病毒 OC43 开始分化为目前的基因型。
bt_pert_zh: In the 1950s, human coronavirus OC43 began to diverge into its current genotypes.

en: Phylogentically, mouse hepatitis virus (Murine coronavirus), which infects the mouse's liver and the central nervous system, is related to  human coronavirus OC43 and bovine coronavirus.
zh: 从生物系统上来说，感染小鼠肝脏和中枢神经系统的小鼠肝炎病毒（鼠冠状病毒），与人冠状病毒 OC43 和牛冠状病毒有关。
pert_zh: 从生物系统上来说，感染小鼠肝脏和中枢神经系统的小鼠肝炎病毒（鼠冠状病毒），与人冠状病毒 OC43 和牛冠状病毒有关。
bt_pert_zh: Biologically, mouse hepatitis virus (murine coronavirus), which infects the liver and central nervous system of mice, is related to human coronavirus OC43 and bovine coronavirus.

en: Human coronavirus HKU1, like the aforementioned viruses, also has its origins in rodents.
zh: 与上述病毒一样，人冠状病毒 HKU1 也起源于啮齿动物。
pert_zh: 人冠状病毒 HKU1 也与上述病毒一样，起源于啮齿动物。
bt_pert_zh: Like the above viruses, human coronavirus HKU1 originated from rodents.

en: Coronaviruses vary significantly in risk factor.
zh: 冠状病毒在危险因素上有显著差异。
pert_zh: 在危险因素上，冠状病毒有显著差异。
bt_pert_zh: There are significant differences in risk factors among coronaviruses.

en: Some can kill more than 30% of those infected, such as MERS-CoV, and some are relatively harmless, such as the common cold.
zh: 有些病毒可导致 30% 以上的感染者致死，如 MERS-CoV，有些则相对无害，只引起普通感冒等轻微病症。
pert_zh: 有些病毒可导致 30% 以上的感染者致死，如 MERS-CoV，有些则相对无害，只引起轻微病症如普通感冒。
bt_pert_zh: Some viruses kill more than 30% of those they infect, like MERS-CoV, while others are relatively harmless, causing only mild illness like the common cold.

en: Coronaviruses can cause colds with major symptoms, such as fever, and a sore throat from swollen adenoids.
zh: 冠状病毒可引起感冒的主要症状，如发热和咽喉肿痛。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒可引起主要的感冒症状，如发热和咽喉肿痛。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses can cause primary cold symptoms, such as fever and sore throat.

en: Coronaviruses can cause pneumonia (either direct viral pneumonia or secondary bacterial pneumonia) and bronchitis (either direct viral bronchitis or secondary bacterial bronchitis).
zh: 冠状病毒可引起肺炎（直接病毒性肺炎或继发性细菌性肺炎）和支气管炎（直接病毒性支气管炎或继发性细菌性支气管炎）。
pert_zh: 直接病毒性肺炎或继发性细菌性肺炎）和支气管炎（直接病毒性支气管炎或继发性细菌性支气管炎）可引起冠状病毒肺炎。
bt_pert_zh: Coronavirus pneumonia can be caused by direct viral pneumonia or secondary bacterial pneumonia) and bronchitis (direct viral bronchitis or secondary bacterial bronchitis).

en: The human coronavirus discovered in 2003, SARS-CoV, which causes severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS), has a unique pathogenesis because it causes both upper and lower respiratory tract infections.Six species of human coronaviruses are known, with one species subdivided into two different strains, making seven strains of human coronaviruses altogether.
zh: 2003 年发现的人冠状病毒 SARS-CoV 可引起严重急性呼吸道综合征 (SARS)，它有独特的发病机制，因为它可同时引起上下呼吸道感染。目前已知有六种人冠状病毒，其中一种又细分为两种不同的病毒株，因此共形成了七种人冠状病毒。
pert_zh: 在 2003 年发现的人冠状病毒 SARS-CoV 可引起严重急性呼吸道综合征 (SARS)，它有独特的发病机制，因为它可同时引起上下呼吸道感染。目前已知有六种人冠状病毒，其中一种又细分为两种不同的病毒株，因此共形成了七种人冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: The human coronavirus SARS-CoV, which was discovered in 2003 and causes severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS), has a unique pathogenesis because it can cause infection of both the upper and lower respiratory tract. There are currently six known human coronaviruses, one of which is subdivided into two different strains, making a total of seven human coronaviruses.

en: Four of these coronaviruses continually circulate in the human population and produce the generally mild symptoms of the common cold in adults and children worldwide: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, -NL63.
zh: 其中四种冠状病毒在人群中持续传播，并在全世界成人和儿童中产生一般较轻的普通感冒症状：-OC43、-HKU1、HCoV-229E、-NL63。
pert_zh: 其中四种冠状病毒在人群中持续传播，并在全世界成人和儿童中产生一般较轻的普通感冒症状：-OC43、-HKU1、HCoV-229E、-NL63。
bt_pert_zh: Four of these coronaviruses continue to circulate among people and produce generally milder common cold symptoms in adults and children worldwide: -OC43, -HKU1, HCoV-229E, and -NL63.

en: Coronaviruses cause about 15% of commons colds.
zh: 冠状病毒引起约 15% 的普通感冒。
pert_zh: 约 15% 的普通感冒是冠状病毒引起的。
bt_pert_zh: About 15% of common colds are caused by coronaviruses.

en: The majority of colds are caused by rhinoviruses.
zh: 大多数感冒是由鼻病毒引起的。
pert_zh: 由鼻病毒引起的是大多数感冒。
bt_pert_zh: Most colds are caused by rhinoviruses.

en: The four mild coronaviruses have a seasonal incidence occurring in the winter months in temperate climates.
zh: 四种轻度冠状病毒在温带气候的冬季月份会季节性发生。
pert_zh: 在温带气候的冬季月份会季节性发生四种轻度冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Four mild coronaviruses occur seasonally during the winter months in temperate climates.

en: There is no preference towards a particular season in tropical climates.
zh: 在热带气候中，冠状病毒没有特定季节的偏好。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒在热带气候中，没有特定季节的偏好。
bt_pert_zh: Coronavirus has no preference for a particular season in tropical climates.

en: Four human coronaviruses produce symptoms that are generally mild:
zh: 四种人冠状病毒产生的症状通常较轻：
pert_zh: 四种人冠状病毒产生的症状通常较轻：
bt_pert_zh: The four human coronaviruses produce symptoms that are generally mild:

en: The virus was officially named the SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).
zh: 这种病毒被正式命名为 SARS 冠状病毒 (SARS-CoV)。
pert_zh: 这种病毒被正式命名为 SARS 冠状病毒 (SARS-CoV)。
bt_pert_zh: The virus was officially named SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV).

en: More than 8,000 people were infected, about ten percent of whom died.
zh: 超过 8,000 人已感染，其中约 10% 死亡。
pert_zh: 已感染超过 8,000 人，其中约 10% 死亡。
bt_pert_zh: More than 8,000 people have been infected, with about 10% dying.

en: In September 2012, a new type of coronavirus was identified, initially called Novel Coronavirus 2012, and now officially named Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
zh: 2012 年 9 月，一种新型冠状病毒被发现，最初被称为 2012 新型冠状病毒，现在被正式命名为中东呼吸综合征冠状病毒 (MERS-CoV)。
pert_zh: 一种新型冠状病毒在2012年9月被发现，最初被称为2012新型冠状病毒，现在被正式命名为中东呼吸综合征冠状病毒(MERS-CoV)。
bt_pert_zh: A new coronavirus was discovered in September 2012, initially called 2012 novel coronavirus and now officially named Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS-CoV).

en: The World Health Organization issued a global alert soon after.
zh: 世界卫生组织不久后发布了全球警报。
pert_zh: 不久后世界卫生组织发布了全球警报。
bt_pert_zh: Soon after, the World Health Organization issued a global alert.

en: The WHO update on 28 September 2012 said the virus did not seem to pass easily from person to person.
zh: WHO 在 2012 年 9 月 28 日的更新中称，该病毒似乎在人与人之间不易传播。
pert_zh: 在 2012 年 9 月 28 日的更新中，WHO 称，该病毒似乎不易在人与人之间传播。
bt_pert_zh: In an update on September 28, 2012, the WHO said the virus does not appear to spread easily from person to person.

en: However, on 12 May 2013, a case of human-to-human transmission in France was confirmed by the French Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
zh: 然而，2013 年 5 月 12 日，法国社会事务和卫生部确诊了法国的一例人传人病例。
pert_zh: 然而，法国社会事务和卫生部在2013年5月12日确诊了一例法国的人传人病例。
bt_pert_zh: However, the French Ministry of Social Affairs and Health confirmed a case of human-to-human transmission in France on May 12, 2013.

en: In addition, cases of human-to-human transmission were reported by the Ministry of Health in Tunisia.
zh: 此外，突尼斯卫生部也报告了人传人病例。
pert_zh: 突尼斯卫生部也报告了人传人病例。此外，
bt_pert_zh: The Tunisian Ministry of Health has also reported cases of human-to-human transmission.

en: Two confirmed cases involved people who seemed to have caught the disease from their late father, who became ill after a visit to Qatar and Saudi Arabia.
zh: 两起确诊病例的患者似乎是被其已故父亲感染的，他们的父亲在访问卡塔尔和沙特阿拉伯后患病。
pert_zh: 患者的两例确诊病例似乎是被其已故父亲感染的，他们的父亲在访问卡塔尔和沙特阿拉伯后患病。
bt_pert_zh: Two of the patients' confirmed cases appear to have been infected by their late father, who fell ill after visiting Qatar and Saudi Arabia.

en: Despite this, it appears the virus had trouble spreading from human to human, as most individuals who are infected do not transmit the virus.
zh: 尽管如此，该病毒似乎难以在人与人之间传播，因为大多数感染者不会传染病毒。
pert_zh: 尽管如此，因为大多数感染者不会传染病毒，该病毒似乎难以在人与人之间传播。
bt_pert_zh: Still, the virus appears to spread poorly from person to person because most infected people do not pass it on.

en: The final name for the virus is Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).
zh: 该病毒最终被命名为中东呼吸综合征冠状病毒 (MERS-CoV)。
pert_zh: 该病毒最终被命名为中东呼吸综合征冠状病毒（MERS-CoV）。
bt_pert_zh: The virus was eventually named Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS-CoV).

en: The only U.S. cases (both survived) were recorded in May 2014.In May 2015, an outbreak of MERS-CoV occurred in the Republic of Korea, when a man who had traveled to the Middle East, visited four hospitals in the Seoul area to treat his illness.
zh: 2014 年 5 月，美国记录了仅有的两例（均存活）。2015 年 5 月，一名去过中东的男子前往首尔地区的四家医院看诊，由此 MERS-CoV 在韩国爆发。
pert_zh: 2014 年 5 月，美国记录了仅有的两例（均存活）。2015 年 5 月，一名前往首尔地区四家医院看诊的去过中东的男子，由此 MERS-CoV 在韩国爆发。
bt_pert_zh: The only two cases (both alive) were recorded in the United States in May 2014. In May 2015, an outbreak of MERS-CoV occurred in South Korea in a man who had traveled to the Middle East and visited four hospitals in the Seoul area.

en: This caused one of the largest outbreaks of MERS-CoV outside the Middle East.
zh: 这引发了中东以外地区最大规模的 MERS-CoV 疫情。
pert_zh: 最大规模的 MERS-CoV 疫情引发了中东以外地区。
bt_pert_zh: The largest outbreaks of MERS-CoV have occurred outside the Middle East.

en: As of December 2019, 2,468 cases of MERS-CoV infection had been confirmed by laboratory tests, 851 of which were fatal, a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.
zh: 截至 2019 年 12 月，经实验室检测确诊的 MERS-CoV 感染病例为 2,468 例，其中死亡 851 例，死亡率约为 34.5%。
pert_zh: 截至 2019 年 12 月，经实验室检测确诊的 MERS-CoV 感染病例为 2,468 例，其中死亡 851 例，死亡率约为 34.5%。
bt_pert_zh: As of December 2019, there were 2,468 laboratory-confirmed cases of MERS-CoV infection, including 851 deaths, for a mortality rate of approximately 34.5%.

en: In December 2019, a pneumonia outbreak was reported in Wuhan, China.
zh: 2019 年 12 月，中国武汉爆发了肺炎疫情。
pert_zh: 中国武汉在2019年12月爆发了肺炎疫情。
bt_pert_zh: An outbreak of pneumonia occurred in Wuhan, China in December 2019.

en: On 31 December 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel strain of coronavirus, which was given the interim name 2019-nCoV by the World Health Organization (WHO), later renamed SARS-CoV-2 by the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses.
zh: 2019 年 12 月 31 日，疫情爆发被追溯到一种新型冠状病毒，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 将其临时命名为 2019-nCoV，后来国际病毒分类学委员会将其更名为 SARS-CoV-2。
pert_zh: 2019 年 12 月 31 日，疫情爆发被追溯到一种新型冠状病毒，国际病毒分类学委员会后来将其更名为 SARS-CoV-2，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 将其临时命名为 2019-nCoV。
bt_pert_zh: On December 31, 2019, the outbreak was traced to a novel coronavirus, which the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses later renamed SARS-CoV-2 and the World Health Organization (WHO) provisionally named 2019-nCoV.

en: Some researchers have suggested the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market may not be the original source of viral transmission to humans.As of 17 April 2020, there have been at least 153,822 confirmed deaths and more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases in the coronavirus pneumonia pandemic.
zh: 一些研究人员认为，华南海鲜批发市场可能不是该病毒传染给人类的最初来源。截至 2020 年 4 月 17 日，冠状病毒肺炎疫情已造成至少 153,822 例确诊死亡，超过 2,240,191 例确诊病例。
pert_zh: 一些研究人员认为，该病毒可能不是华南海鲜批发市场传染给人类的最初来源。截至 2020 年 4 月 17 日，冠状病毒肺炎疫情已造成超过 2,240,191 例确诊病例，至少 153,822 例确诊死亡。
bt_pert_zh: Some researchers believe that the virus may not be the original source of transmission to humans at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market. As of April 17, 2020, the coronavirus pneumonia epidemic has caused more than 2,240,191 confirmed cases and at least 153,822 confirmed deaths.

en: The Wuhan strain has been identified as a new strain of Betacoronavirus from group 2B with approximately 70% genetic similarity to the SARS-CoV.
zh: 武汉菌株已被确定为来自 2B 组的新型冠状病毒，与 SARS-CoV 的遗传相似性约为 70%。
pert_zh: 来自 2B 组的新型冠状病毒，武汉菌株已被确定为，与 SARS-CoV 的遗传相似性约为 70%。
bt_pert_zh: The novel coronavirus from group 2B, the Wuhan strain, has been identified as having a genetic similarity of about 70% with SARS-CoV.

en: The virus has a 96% similarity to a bat coronavirus, so it is widely suspected to originate from bats as well.
zh: 该病毒与蝙蝠冠状病毒的相似性为 96%，因此人们普遍怀疑它也源自蝙蝠。
pert_zh: 因此人们普遍怀疑它也源自蝙蝠，该病毒与蝙蝠冠状病毒的相似性为 96%。
bt_pert_zh: It is therefore widely suspected that it also originated from bats, with the virus being 96% similar to bat coronaviruses.

en: The pandemic has resulted in travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.
zh: 此次疫情导致多个国家采取旅行限制和全国封锁措施。
pert_zh: 多个国家采取旅行限制和全国封锁措施导致此次疫情。
bt_pert_zh: The outbreak was caused by travel restrictions and nationwide lockdowns in several countries.

en: Coronaviruses have been recognized as causing pathological conditions in veterinary medicine since the 1930s.
zh: 自 20 世纪 30 年代以来，冠状病毒一直被认为是引起兽医疾病的原因。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒自 20 世纪 30 年代以来一直被认为是引起兽医疾病的原因。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses have been known to cause veterinary illness since the 1930s.

en: Except for avian infectious bronchitis, the major related diseases have mainly an intestinal location.
zh: 除禽传染性支气管炎外，主要相关疾病大部分发生在肠道。
pert_zh: 主要相关疾病大部分发生在肠道，除禽传染性支气管炎外。
bt_pert_zh: The main associated diseases occur mostly in the intestine, with the exception of avian infectious bronchitis.

en: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tract of mammals and birds.
zh: 冠状病毒主要感染哺乳动物和鸟类的上呼吸道和胃肠道。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒主要感染哺乳动物和鸟类的上呼吸道和胃肠道。
bt_pert_zh: Coronaviruses primarily infect the upper respiratory and gastrointestinal tracts of mammals and birds.

en: They also cause a range of diseases in farm animals and domesticated pets, some of which can be serious and are a threat to the farming industry.
zh: 它们还会在农场动物和家养宠物中引发一系列疾病，其中某些疾病可能很严重并威胁到农业生产。
pert_zh: 在农场动物和家养宠物中，它们还会引发一系列疾病，其中某些疾病可能很严重并威胁到农业生产。
bt_pert_zh: In farm animals and domestic pets, they also cause a range of diseases, some of which can be serious and threaten agricultural production.

en: In chickens, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV), a coronavirus, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.
zh: 在鸡中，传染性支气管炎病毒（IBV）是一种冠状病毒，不仅针对呼吸道，还针对泌尿生殖道。
pert_zh: 传染性支气管炎病毒（IBV）是一种冠状病毒，在鸡中，不仅针对呼吸道，还针对泌尿生殖道。
bt_pert_zh: Infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) is a coronavirus that, in chickens, targets not only the respiratory tract but also the urogenital tract.

en: The virus can spread to different organs throughout the chicken.
zh: 该病毒可以扩散到鸡的各个器官。
pert_zh: 该病毒可以扩散到鸡的各个器官。
bt_pert_zh: The virus can spread to various organs of the chicken.

en: Economically significant coronaviruses of farm animals include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, which both result in diarrhea in young animals.
zh: 可造成严重经济损失的农场动物冠状病毒包括猪冠状病毒（猪传染性胃肠炎病毒，TGE）和牛冠状病毒，这两种病毒都会导致动物幼仔腹泻。
pert_zh: 包括猪冠状病毒（猪传染性胃肠炎病毒，TGE）和牛冠状病毒，这两种病毒可导致动物幼仔腹泻，可造成严重经济损失的农场动物冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: These include porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis virus, TGE) and bovine coronavirus, both of which can cause diarrhea in young animals and are farm animal coronaviruses that can cause serious economic losses.

en: Feline coronavirus: two forms, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of minor clinical significance, but spontaneous mutation of this virus can result in feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease associated with high mortality.
zh: 猫冠状病毒：有两种形式，猫肠道冠状病毒是一种临床意义不大的病原体，但该病毒的自发突变可导致猫传染性腹膜炎 (FIP)，这是一种死亡率较高的疾病。
pert_zh: 有两种形式的猫冠状病毒，猫肠道冠状病毒是一种临床意义不大的病原体，但该病毒的自发突变可导致猫传染性腹膜炎 (FIP)，这是一种死亡率较高的疾病。
bt_pert_zh: There are two forms of feline coronavirus, feline enteric coronavirus is a pathogen of little clinical significance, but spontaneous mutations of the virus can cause feline infectious peritonitis (FIP), a disease with a high mortality rate.

en: Similarly, there are two types of coronavirus that infect ferrets: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes a gastrointestinal syndrome known as epizootic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic version of the virus (like FIP in cats) known as ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).
zh: 同样，感染雪貂的冠状病毒也有两种类型：雪貂肠道冠状病毒，它可引起一种胃肠道综合征，称为地区性卡他儿肠炎 (ECE)，以及一种更致命的全身性病毒（如猫中的 FIP），称为雪貂全身性冠状病毒 (FSC)。
pert_zh: 同样，感染雪貂的冠状病毒也有两种类型：雪貂肠道冠状病毒，它可引起一种胃肠道综合征，称为地区性卡他儿肠炎 (ECE)，以及一种更致命的全身性病毒（如猫中的 FIP），称为雪貂全身性冠状病毒 (FSC)。
bt_pert_zh: Likewise, there are two types of coronaviruses that infect ferrets: ferret enteric coronavirus, which causes a gastrointestinal syndrome called endemic catarrhal enteritis (ECE), and a more lethal systemic virus (like FIP in cats) called ferret systemic coronavirus (FSC).

en: There are two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV), one that causes mild gastrointestinal disease and one that has been found to cause respiratory disease.
zh: 犬冠状病毒 (CCoV) 有两种类型，一种会引起轻度胃肠疾病，另一种被发现可引起呼吸系统疾病。
pert_zh: CCoV（犬冠状病毒）有两种类型，一种被发现可引起呼吸系统疾病，另一种会引起轻度胃肠疾病。
bt_pert_zh: There are two types of CCoV (canine coronavirus), one that has been found to cause respiratory illness and the other that causes mild gastrointestinal illness.

en: Mouse hepatitis virus (MHV) is a coronavirus that causes an epidemic murine illness with high mortality, especially among colonies of laboratory mice.
zh: 鼠肝炎病毒 (MHV) 是一种冠状病毒，可引起高死亡率的流行性鼠类疾病，特别是在实验室小鼠群体中。
pert_zh: 一种冠状病毒，鼠肝炎病毒 (MHV)，在实验室小鼠群体中特别是可引起高死亡率的流行性鼠类疾病。
bt_pert_zh: One coronavirus, murine hepatitis virus (MHV), specifically causes an epidemic rodent disease with high mortality in colonies of laboratory mice.

en: Sialodacryoadenitis virus (SDAV) is highly infectious coronavirus of laboratory rats, which can be transmitted between individuals by direct contact and indirectly by aerosol.
zh: 大鼠涎泪膜炎病毒 (SDAV) 是一种实验室大鼠的高传染性冠状病毒，可通过直接接触以及间接的气溶胶接触在个体间传播。
pert_zh: SDAV 是一种实验室大鼠的高传染性冠状病毒，可通过直接接触以及间接的气溶胶接触在个体间传播，大鼠涎泪膜炎病毒。
bt_pert_zh: SDAV is a highly contagious coronavirus of laboratory rats that can be transmitted between individuals through direct contact and indirect aerosol contact, rat salivary lacrimal membrane inflammation virus.

en: Some strains of MHV cause a progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice which has been used as a murine model for multiple sclerosis.
zh: 一些 MHV 病毒株可在小鼠中引发进行性脱髓鞘性脑炎，已被用作多发性硬化症的小鼠模型。
pert_zh: 已被用作多发性硬化症的小鼠模型的一些 MHV 病毒株可在小鼠中引发进行性脱髓鞘性脑炎。
bt_pert_zh: Some MHV strains that have been used as mouse models of multiple sclerosis can induce progressive demyelinating encephalitis in mice.

en: Significant research efforts have been focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, especially by virologists interested in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.
zh: 大量的研究工作集中在阐明这些动物冠状病毒的病毒发病机制，这在对兽医和人畜共患病感兴趣的病毒学家中尤为如此。
pert_zh: 大量的研究工作集中在阐明这些动物冠状病毒的病毒发病机制，在对兽医和人畜共患病感兴趣的病毒学家中尤为如此。
bt_pert_zh: Considerable research effort has focused on elucidating the viral pathogenesis of these animal coronaviruses, particularly among virologists with interests in veterinary and zoonotic diseases.

en: Porcine coronavirus (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of pigs, TGEV).
zh: 猪冠状病毒（猪传染性胃肠炎冠状病毒，TGEV）。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒猪（猪传染性胃肠炎冠状病毒，TGEV）。
bt_pert_zh: Coronavirus swine (transmissible gastroenteritis coronavirus of swine, TGEV).

en: Bovine coronavirus (BCV), responsible for severe profuse enteritis in of young calves.
zh: 牛冠状病毒 (BCV)，在小牛中引发各种严重的肠炎。
pert_zh: 在小牛中引发各种严重的肠炎的是牛冠状病毒(BCV)。
bt_pert_zh: The bovine coronavirus (BCV) is responsible for causing a variety of severe enteritis in calves.

en: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) causes mild enteritis in cats as well as severe Feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).
zh: 猫冠状病毒 (FCoV) 可引起猫轻度肠炎以及严重的猫传染性腹膜炎（同一病毒的其他变种）。
pert_zh: (FCoV) 猫冠状病毒可引起猫轻度肠炎以及严重的猫传染性腹膜炎（同一病毒的其他变种）。
bt_pert_zh: Feline coronavirus (FCoV) can cause mild enteritis in cats as well as severe feline infectious peritonitis (other variants of the same virus).

en: the two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causing enteritis, the other found in respiratory diseases).
zh: 两种类型的犬冠状病毒 (CCoV)（一种引起肠炎，另一种在呼吸系统疾病中发现）。
pert_zh: 两种类型的犬冠状病毒 (CCoV)（一种引起肠炎，另一种在呼吸系统疾病中发现）。
bt_pert_zh: Two types of canine coronavirus (CCoV) (one causes enteritis and the other is found in respiratory disease).

en: Turkey coronavirus (TCV) causes enteritis in turkeys.
zh: 火鸡冠状病毒 (TCV) 引起火鸡肠炎。
pert_zh: TCV引起火鸡肠炎火鸡冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: TCV causes turkey enteritis and is caused by turkey coronavirus.

en: Ferret enteric coronavirus causes epizootic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets.
zh: 雪貂肠道冠状病毒可在雪貂中引起地区性卡他儿肠炎。
pert_zh: 雪貂中引起地区性卡他儿肠炎的原因是雪貂肠道冠状病毒。
bt_pert_zh: The cause of endemic catarrhal enteritis in ferrets is the ferret enteric coronavirus.

en: Ferret systemic coronavirus causes FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.
zh: 雪貂全身性冠状病毒可在雪貂中引起 FIP 样全身性综合征。
pert_zh: 雪貂全身性冠状病毒可引起 FIP 样全身性综合征在雪貂中。
bt_pert_zh: Ferret systemic coronavirus can cause a FIP-like systemic syndrome in ferrets.

en: Rabbit enteric coronavirus causes acute gastrointestinal disease and diarrhea in young European rabbits.
zh: 兔肠道冠状病毒可在欧洲幼兔中引起急性胃肠道疾病和腹泻。
pert_zh: 在欧洲幼兔中，兔肠道冠状病毒可引起急性胃肠道疾病和腹泻。
bt_pert_zh: Rabbit enteric coronavirus can cause acute gastrointestinal illness and diarrhea in young European rabbits.

en: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV), has emerged around the world.
zh: 猪流行性腹泻病毒（PED 或 PEDV）已在世界各地出现。
pert_zh: 在世界各地已出现猪流行性腹泻病毒（PED 或 PEDV）。
bt_pert_zh: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PED or PEDV) has occurred throughout the world.
